PythonEduLab will be a meta-package containing everything needed to teach computer science on Edubuntu using Python.

=== Software ===

** python2.4
** pythoncard
** pythoncard-doc
** pythoncard-tools
** python-pygame
** gvr
** livewires

=== IDE ===

The present state of affairs in Python IDE developement is this:  there are over half a dozen different Python
development environments, each of which does some things well and other things poorly.  None of them at present
are optimal.
